title: EUROMILLIONS RESULTS: Euromillions and Millionaire Maker results...
content:
THE  Euromillions  draw on Tuesday night saw players gunning for an estimated £10 million Lotto jackpot. 

But, after thousands bought a ticket in the hope of becoming millionaires, there were no winners of the Tuesday, September 1 Euromillions draw. 

The winning numbers were 6, 19, 21, 27 and 45. The lucky stars were 1 and 8. 

Three winners matched five numbers and one lucky star for £229,413. Were you among them? 

The Euromillions Millionaire Maker raffle result was: NJB393458. One prize of £1 million is up for grabs for the holder of this raffle number. 

Are you a winner? Good luck!
